original_text: And the vision of all is become unto you as the words of a book that is sealed, which men deliver to one that is learned, saying, Read this, I pray thee: and he saith, I cannot; for it is sealed:
korean_text: 그러므로 모든 계시가 너희에게는 봉한 책의 말처럼 되었으니 그것을 글 아는 자에게 주며 이르기를 그대에게 청하노니 이를 읽으라 하면 그가 대답하기를 그것이 봉해졌으니 나는 못 읽겠노라 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: And the vision of all is become unto you
as the words of a book that is sealed
which men deliver to one that is learned
saying, Read this, I pray thee:

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 말하되 나는 할 수 없노라
